betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §6Killer Joe§r is used in Mob Farms to §eautomatically kill mobs with a specialized weapon§r. It does consume any energy. However, it instead §econsumes §9Nutrient Distillation§r which is a Fluid from §5EnderIO§r. It must have the §eappropriate tool in the weapon slot in order for it to work§r.

To craft the Killer Joe, you'll need you'll need five §6Fused Quartz§r, three §6Dark Steel Ingot§rs, and a §6Frank'n'Zombie§r.

To make the Nutrient Distillation, you'd need §6The Vat§r.
In The Vat, you'll need to §aput raw matter on the left slot§r. This includes §eraw meats, §6Rotten Flesh§e, zombie brains and mob heads§r. In the right slot, you'll need either §6Sugar§r, §6Mushroom§r, §6Nether Wart§r or §6Fermented Spider Eye§r. These items §ediffer by their multiplier rates§r. Each would give from 75% yield to 200% the original amount. Lastly, the §eleft tank would need §9Water§r.
